meanings.definition: The moment when a rocket or spacecraft leaves the ground.
meanings.sent1: The liftoffs of the rocket were always thrilling to watch.
meanings.sent2: The liftoffs of the spacecraft were smooth and powerful.
meanings.sent3: The liftoffs of the rocket made the spectators cheer with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The liftoffs of the spacecraft symbolized humanity's reach for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The liftoffs of the rocket were like a giant leap towards the unknown.

meanings.definition: The act of taking off or rising into the air.
meanings.sent1: The liftoffs of the birds in the morning signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent2: The liftoffs of the airplanes at the airport were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The liftoffs of the kites in the park brought joy to the children playing.
meanings.sent4: The liftoffs of the balloons in the sky painted a colorful picture.
meanings.sent5: The liftoffs of the leaves in the wind danced gracefully through the air.

meanings.definition: The beginning or start of a journey or project.
meanings.sent1: The liftoffs of their business venture were met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: The liftoffs of the space mission marked a new chapter in exploration.
meanings.sent3: The liftoffs of the school play were filled with nervous excitement.
meanings.sent4: The liftoffs of the new initiative brought hope for a better future.
meanings.sent5: The liftoffs of the friendship journey began with a single step.
